name: sandbox
description: - ga.js   - test google authenticator and bcrypt - aes.js   - test encrypt and decrypt with AES - net.js   - list of NodeJS net library use case - net-retries.js   -net library retry connection example - kafkaRx.js   - kafka consumer   - requires kafka to run (see /docker-devenv/kafka) - kafkaTx.js   - kafka producer   - requires kafka to run (see /docker-devenv/kafka) - tcpServer.js   - a sample tcp server   - use putty (raw tcp mode) to connect and test
